select edpf.id, edpf.energy_id, edpf.formula_scale, edpf.formula_type, edpf.energy_formula,
( ifnull( (select 1 from ems_coal_factor_history ecfh where ecfh.deleted = 0 and ecfh.formula_id = edpf.id and ecfh.end_time is null limit 1), ifnull( (select 2 from ems_coal_factor_history ecfh where ecfh.deleted = 0 and ecfh.formula_id = edpf.id and ecfh.start_time is not null and ecfh.end_time is not null limit 1), 0) ))
(if((select 1 from ems_unit_price_configuration eupc where eupc.deleted = 0 and eupc.formula_id = edpf.id limit 1), (ifnull( (select 2 from ems_unit_price_configuration eupc where eupc.deleted = 0 and eupc.formula_id = edpf.id and eupc.end_time < now() limit 1), 1)), 0) )
as formulaStatus from ems_da_param_formula edpf
edpf.deleted = 0
and edpf.energy_id = #{vo.energyId}
and edpf.formula_type = #{vo.formulaType}
